
```{r colors-functions}
colors <-
  list(
    dark_grey = sc("grey5"),
    grey = sc("grey4"),
    light_grey = "#888888"
  )

section_subheader <- function(title, subtitle, when, where) {
  glue(
    '<p style = "text-align:left; font-size:1.1em;"> 
      {left} {right}
      <br> {bottom_left}{bottom_right}
    </p>',
    left = glue("<strong> {title} </strong>"),
    right = glue('<span style="float:right; font-size:1em;"> <i>{when}</i></span>'),
    bottom_left = glue('<span style="font-variant:small-caps; font-size:1em;">, {subtitle} </span>'),
    bottom_right = glue('<span style="float:right; font-size:1em;"> <i>{where}</i></span>')
  ) |> 
    HTML()
}
```
